name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_アルティミシア

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Shockwave Pulsar (C)]
• Reduces all enemies' BRV to 1/4 before BRV attacks
• Becomes 4-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + split AoE HP attack
+ 6-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + split AoE HP attack
• Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 200%
• Special Effect duration +3
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ショックウェーブパルサー【C】」使用時
・BRV攻撃前 敵全体のBRVを1/4にする
・8HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　＋6HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃に変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの200％分
・使用後特殊効果の3ACTION期間延長

desc.en:
Increases own BRV by 150% of Initial BRV before BRV attacks
2-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Deals split HP damage between all targets
No Action Delay
Does not increase turn count
Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Self: 6 turns [Griever Magics]; 2 turns special effect [Junction Griever]

While [Junction Griever] is active
• Lowers Action Delay to 0
• Does not increase turn count
• Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Instant turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
